meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a system or process that involves the use of energy.
meanings.sent1: The ergotic machine efficiently converted energy into work.
meanings.sent2: The ergotic system in the factory helped save electricity.
meanings.sent3: The ergotic device was so powerful, it made the other machines jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an ergotic engine, constantly generating new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The ergotic process was like a well-oiled machine, smoothly producing results.

meanings.definition: A substance that is capable of producing energy.
meanings.sent1: The scientist discovered a new ergotic that could power entire cities.
meanings.sent2: The ergotic extracted from plants was used to fuel the spaceship.
meanings.sent3: The little ergotic seemed to have a personality of its own, always eager to work.
meanings.sent4: His determination was an ergotic, driving him to achieve his goals.
meanings.sent5: The ergotic was like a tiny powerhouse, providing endless energy.
